```{r}
# Load R packages
library(plotly)
```

In R, we can use package plotly to make interactive graphs.

1. 
```{r}
fig <- plot_ly(alpha = 0.6)
fig <- fig %>% add_histogram(x = ~rnorm(500))
fig <- fig %>% add_histogram(x = ~rnorm(500) + 1)
fig <- fig %>% layout(barmode = "overlay")

fig

```
